product_name: REI Heavyweight Power Dry Crew Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The REI Heavyweight Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) Crew shirt offers proven value in a substantial base layer for all your hiking, mountaineering or snow-sports adventures. Polartec Power Dry uses two different yarns on either side of the fabric to enhance comfort; interior yarn wicks moisture and exterior yarn dries quickly. Combination of the two yarns helps keep you dry during highly aerobic activities because it moves moisture away from skin and dries more quickly than single-component fabrics. Soft, flat seams help eliminate chafing; seams at the shoulders are strategically positioned to work with pack straps; underarm and side gussets promote freedom of motion. Next-to-skin fit hugs the body, maintaining skin contact to boost fabric performance. Longer length helps the REI Heavyweight Polartec Power Dry Crew shirt stay tucked in; smooth texture of outer surface makes it easy to slide on additional layers. Fabric offers a UPF rating of 50+ to protect against harmful UV light. Closeout.
